thread.title: Bears sign tight end Justin Perillo
thread.title_full: Bears sign tight end Justin Perillo

author: Darin Gantt
title: Bears sign tight end Justin Perillo
text:
3 Responses to “Bears sign tight end Justin Perillo” bondlake says: Feb 10, 2017 5:17 PM 
Sure was a good thing da Bears got rid of Greg Olsen, wasn’t it? Feb 10, 2017 5:30 PM 
Man, the Vikings are slipping, letting the bears get all these former Packers. aypeeswhippingstick says: Feb 10, 2017 6:02 PM 
The other NFC North division teams should pay the Green Bay Packers royalties for all the Packer castoffs they later scoop up. I’m talking to you Bears, Lions and Vikings! Leave a Reply
